title: New: Eddi Front – Into My Arms (Nick Cave Cover)
body:
**Eddi Front** has come such a long way in such a short space of time, and it’s fantastic to witness her garnering the recognition she deserves.

With her debut EP set to be released on [Best Fit Recordings](http://bestfitrecordings.limitedrun.com/products/505675-eddi-front) later in the year, she’s unveiled the final track to be taken from the self-titled EP, a stunning cover of **Nick Cave’s** _Into My Arms_. Utilizing her 50’s style piano to illustrious effect, the vocals are as poignant and resplendent as ever, telling stories not just through words but through the sultry tones. Check out _Into My Arms_ below.
